column4: Hi, I mounted the cd-rom on a mac, and it said it was a joliet file system.
So why isn't my Ubuntu able to mount it? I think it should right?
Where did you get this iso image? What is it?
Jordan, it is a cd, with documents on it, I think.
thanks, I'll look at that report.
As a somewhat odd test / work around can you try "sudo grub-mount /dev/sr0 /mnt/"?
